statements: UPDATE user_activity SET device_type = 'Desktop' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activity SET event_details = '{"action": "click", "element": "button"}' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'Login', device_type = 'Web' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_timestamp = NOW(), session_id = 98765, event_details = '{"login_successful": true}' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_description = 'Updated Activity' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET username='Jane_Doe', email='jane.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type='Login', activity_date='2022-03-15 09:00:00', activity_description='User logged in successfully' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE activities SET activity_type='new_activity_type', activity_date='2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE activity_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE performance SET response_time = 50, app_version = 'v2.0.1' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE performance_logs SET duration_ms=1500, action='Login' WHERE log_id=3;
UPDATE users SET username='johndoe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE performance_logs SET action='login', duration_ms=50, timestamp='2021-10-20 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_activity SET action_taken = 'Logged Out' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE page_view SET timestamp = '2022-05-10 08:00:00' WHERE view_id = 201;
UPDATE user_activity SET username = 'JohnDoe', action_taken = 'Logged out' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE page_view SET page_url = '/page2', timestamp = '2023-06-15 09:30:00' WHERE user_id = 54321;
